attributes.action: Conduct a vote of elected MP'S to decide if the UK should leave the EU.
attributes.additional_details: Lies from the Brexit side over the £350m. Also people not understanding the consequences of their actions. In addition we have no right to take a whole country like Scotland out against their will
attributes.background: I am totally unhappy with the public EU referendum result and feel in the best interests of our country it is decided if we stay or leave by elected MP's. A vote needs to be taken in Parliament.
